T02TD1525E:82b-4: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1525E:82b-5: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor bas /
T02TD1525E:82b-6: dur khrod la sogs par stan bde ba la 'dug ste kha lto phyogs su bltas nas /
T02TD1525E:82b-7: 'gro ba thams cad bde chen zung 'jug thob par bya ba'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1525E:82b-8: mdun du bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang lhag pa'i lha bltas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1525E:83a-2: de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyi spyi bor aa las bskyed pa'i steng du ham yig nag po las 'od zer 'phros pa las rdo rje /
T02TD1525E:83a-3: de las bde mchog yab yum gnyis su med par 'khril ba'i lha'i sku 'ja' tshon nam /
T02TD1525E:83a-4: chu zla shar ba lta bu'i sgyu ma'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1525E:83a-5: de la rang gis mchod pa rnam pa lnga spros la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1525E:83a-6: de nas gsol ba gdab pa ni //
T02TD1525E:83a-7: bde chen dpal gyi mgon po yis //
T02TD1525E:83a-8: sangs rgyas skyob pa ji lta bar //
T02TD1525E:83a-9: dag pa'i de nyid ston mdzad pa //
T02TD1525E:83a-10: di ring bdag la mgon dgyes mdzod//
T02TD1525E:83a-11: ces gsol ba btab pas yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar bab pas rtsa gsum la brgyud cing /
T02TD1525E:83a-12: lus dang ngag dang yid dag par byas nas lus bde ba'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'o //
T02TD1525E:83a-13: lte bar gtum mo spar ba yis //
T02TD1525E:83a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02TD1525E:83a-15: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas //
T02TD1525E:83a-16: ham las bdud rtsi zla rgyun 'bab //
T02TD1525E:83a-17: rten dang brten pa mnyam ldan pas //
T02TD1525E:83a-18: gcig tu zhu zhing bde ba che //
T02TD1525E:83a-19: rnal 'byor ma yi da ma ru //
T02TD1525E:83a-20: sgra yis bskul gyur bzhengs par bya //
T02TD1525E:83a-21: padma nyi ma'i gdan steng na //
T02TD1525E:83a-22: zhal gcig phyag gnyis brkyang bskum tshul //
T02TD1525E:83a-23: rdo rje dril bu lag na thogs //
T02TD1525E:83a-24: sku ni beed'u rya'i rang bzhin //
T02TD1525E:83a-25: phyag rgya drug gis spras pa'i sku //
T02TD1525E:83a-27: yid bzhin nor bu dbu la 'jog /'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa mnan //
T02TD1525E:83a-28: rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig ma //
T02TD1525E:83a-29: phyag gnyis kyis ni yab la 'khyud //
T02TD1525E:83a-30: rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1525E:83a-31: gtso bo la ni bdud rtsi stobs //
T02TD1525E:83a-32: sku ni bandhu ka ltar dmar //
T02TD1525E:83a-33: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1525E:83a-34: gnyis med bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1525E:83a-35: gsal ba'i sku ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1525E:83a-36: aom hri: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1525E:83a-37: snying po'i sngags 'di dang yid kyi dbye bas sbrul 'khyil pa lta bur dmigs la bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1525E:83a-38: de las mthar lus dang ngag dang yid aom a'a: h'um du gyur pas bsdus la chos thams cad bdag med pa'i dang la stong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1525E:83a-39: gang zhig de nyid shes pa ni //
T02TD1525E:83b-1: the tshom med de 'di nyid du //
T02TD1525E:83b-2: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
T02TD1525E:83b-3: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1525E:83b-4: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02TD1525E:83b-5: slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rjes mdzad pa'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1525E:83b-8: lo ts'a ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bu la ha ri'i dgon par bsgyur ba'o//
